document.full_text: colombian leftist guerrillas may have tried to assassinate rivals of venezuela's president hugo chavez and trained his supporters in urban warfare, an analysis of thousands of seized rebel documents showed on tuesday.
document.title: files from colombia's farc rebels show ties to chavez
lines_and_colors: colombian leftist guerrillas may have tried to assassinate rivals of venezuela's president hugo chavez and trained his supporters in urban warfare, an analysis of thousands of seized rebel documents showed on tuesday.
